channel.title: Leetcode on UNKNOWN SPACE
channel.description: Recent content in Leetcode on UNKNOWN SPACE

item.title: Leetcode journal - Beginning
item.description: Yesterday I have just complete the online assessment of booking.com, which I still feel a little bit frustrated - I could make lots of mistakes and stuck in such easy “algorithm” questions. During this process I could find lots of problems in my mindset, including but not limited to: Lack of the ability analyzing the corner cases, make changes to algorithm based on the corner cases Lack of awareness of algorithms.
